thumb.title: [[TAS] GB 釣り先生 "arbitrary code execution" by CasualPokePlayer in 05:58.83
thumb.description: 転載元https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p6wBHEtrE10以下説明文This is a tool-assisted speedrun. For more information, see https://tasvideos.org/6627M TAS originally published on 2025-07-08 Here, CasualPokePlayer ( https://tasvideos.org/Users/Profile/CasualPokePlayer) would rather not bother with any of that and exploits bugs in the game programming to cause a stack overflow and execute arbitrary code, showing off the popular "Bad Apple!!" music video in the game itself. For further information, reading the author's submission comments ( https://tasvideos.org/9738S ) is highly recommendedThis video includes the song "Bad Apple!!" from Touhou Gensoukyou ~ Lotus Land Story (東方幻想郷 ~ Lotus Land Story). The song was originally composed by ZUN then arranged by Masayoshi Minoshima (Alstroemeria Records). It was sung by nomico with lyrics from Haruka. The music video shown was created by あにら (Anira).If you've enjoyed what you've watched, you can view the original music video on YouTube ( https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FtutLA63Cp8) and purchase the 10th Anniversary Album from Alstroemeria Records vendors ( https://alst.net/arcd0065/... )..
thumb.last_res_body: ここで流せよ 一つ根流しでもし... 釣られた！！ キャッスルヴァニ... キタ、キタ、来て...

tags.tag: スタックオーバーフロー
